thread.section_title: HandmadePiece Art 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 HandmadePiece Art 的点评意见 | www.handmadepiece.com
thread.title: Elizabeth Ganz
thread.title_full: HandmadePiece Art 的点评人 Elizabeth Ganz

author: Elizabeth Ganz
title: Elizabeth Ganz
text: I ordered a reproduction of a Monet painting. This company gave me excellent service by keeping me updated on the process as they went along. The emailed a photo of the painting for my approval before sending it. The painting was exactly as advertised and arrived when they said it would.
